meanings.definition: The lower part of a shirt that extends beyond the waist.
meanings.sent1: His shirttail fluttered in the wind as he ran.
meanings.sent2: She tucked in her shirttail before entering the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy kept tugging on the shirttail, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her ambitions were always just out of reach, like a shirttail slipping through her fingers.
meanings.sent5: The bright red shirttail stood out against the dark pants.

meanings.definition: A small, narrow piece of fabric at the bottom of a shirt.
meanings.sent1: The shirttail had a delicate lace trim.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a loose thread on the shirttail and quickly snipped it off.
meanings.sent3: She playfully flicked the shirttail of her friend to get their attention.
meanings.sent4: The shirttail peeked out from under his jacket, adding a casual touch to his outfit.
meanings.sent5: The shirttail swayed gently as she walked, catching the sunlight.
